description:
As a Social Media Manager with over 9 years of experience, I have a proven track record of driving engagement and achieving powerful results for notable brands such as Beachbody, FashionNova, GetMyBoat, and vidIQ. With a Bachelor of Science in Organizational Management and various certifications in data analytics, marketing, and DEI, I bring a unique perspective and passion for content creation to my work. 

My goal is to bring diverse representation into social media marketing, and I believe in using my voice and experiences to advocate for diversity, equity, and inclusion in the industry. In my career, I have worked my way up from Receptionist to Community Manager to Manager/Strategist, demonstrating my ambition and dedication to the field. I am excited to continue growing and learning in my role as a Social Media Manager, using my curiosity and creativity to drive meaningful and impactful results.

jobDescription2:
- Led social media best practices and activity to increase audiences, followers and engagement. 
- Increased followers on average by 600% for clients on major platforms, including LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok and Facebook. 
- Integrated social media into digital demand generation and eCommerce funnels  through both organic and paid social content and campaigns. 
- Designed and implemented social media strategy to align with business goals and target audiences.
- Created, edited, published and shared engaging content daily across 7 different social networks, developing original content, hashtags, photos, images, and videos. 
- Conducted market, persona, and overall social media research on related companies, current benchmark trends, and audience preferences.
- Set specific objectives and targets for social media performance. 
- Managed tools and benchmarking to track and report on social media performance and ROI. 
- Contributed to positioning and messaging frameworks and developed corporate profiles for social accounts. 
- Created social media editorial calendars and tracked special holidays or national days to align to. 
- Developed and presented strategies, ideas and plans to clients to win new business and drive results for current customers. 
- Participated in daily stand-ups, creative briefings, and pitches.
jobDescription:
-Research who follows the Databook LinkedIn page.
-Research the best times to post and the types of content the audience of the page likes. 
-Create a survey on work-life balance around the holidays for the sales team.
-Create & implement a social media strategy on LinkedIn.
-Create a monthly social media calendar with 6 different content pillars. 
-Reach 3.8k followers on LinkedIn. 
-Raise follower count by over 500 in three months.
-Create and implement an inspirational quote initiative.
-Create a list of influencers in the sales space to collaborate with. 
-Participate in weekly marketing team meetings.
-Increase engagement overall on the LinkedIn page. 
-Write social media content for the CEO and other members of the leadership team. 
-Create a social media promotion plan for a category launch.
-Track and report social media performance and ROI on a weekly basis.  
-Assist with community launch and planning.
